#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define f first
#define s second
#define pii pair<int, int>
#define vi  vector<int> vi;
#define vvi vector<vi>;
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define sst(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define pi(n) printf("%d",n)
#define pl(n) printf("%lld",n)
#define pst(n) printf("%s",n)
#define ps printf(" ")
#define pn printf("\n")
#define MOD 1000000007

using namespace std;

int min3(int x, int y, int z){
	return min(min(x,y),z);
}

int editDistanceDP(int s1[], int s2[], int m, int n){

	int dp[m+1][n+1];
	for(int i=0;i<=m;i++){
		for(int j=0;j<=n;j++){
			if(i==0)
				dp[i][j]=j;
			else if(j==0)
				dp[i][j]=i;
			else if(s1[i-1]==s2[j-1])
				dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];
			else
				dp[i][j]=1+min3(dp[i][j-1], dp[i-1][j], dp[i-1][j-1]);
		}
	}

	return dp[m][n];
}


int main(){
	
 	int t;
 	si(t);
 	while(t--){
 		int m;
 		si(m);
 		int a[m+5];
 		for(int i=0;i<m;++i) si(a[i]);
 		int n;
 		si(n);
 		int b[n+5];
 		for(int i=0;i<n;++i) si(b[i]);
 		pi(editDistanceDP(a, b, m, n));
 		pn;	
 	}   
	return 0;
}
